website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight rain cover that's easy to use and is available in four different sizes for the best results.
pros: Sizes available range from 11 to 31 inches, so you can use it on many different sizes of cameras and tripods
Very easy to install on the camera in a hurry with cinching bands on the front and back
Uses a Velcro fastener on the bottom of the rain cover, which allows you to use it more easily when shooting with a tripod
cons: No sleeves, making it tough to reach the camera's buttons and dials to adjust the settings

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a rain cover for my camera and long lens. As a professional wildlife photographer in harsh climates I wanted something that would protect my gear AND allow me to put my face inside an enclosed area in order to view shots when the sun is bright. This does both. Would recommend and may purchase a second one as I carry two cameras when shooting.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskanEagle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the rain, and it is wonderful. I can still navigate my camera, and trust it won't be ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Anschuetz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Weather tight, very well made, light and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Lightweight and compact. Fits in own pouch. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for photographers
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved my camera. And I was able to take photos even when it was raining.
customer_reviews.author: Virodh

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, medium size fits my camera and large 300mm with hood perfectly and works ok with a 70-200mm as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Was just what I wanted and received it right away. Will use again.
customer_reviews.author: kevin hesselbart

customer_reviews.title: You can stop looking, this meets quality and price point perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Truly perfect for my needs. I bought this to cover my C100 with 70-200, even with a wireless mic receiver on top and all fit perfectly! Rained at the very next gig after this came in. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Laframboise

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels like a very well made product. I am looking forward to using it when I go to Alaska at the end of the month. Although, I hope I don't have to. But if I do, I am confident that my equipment will be well protected.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift and is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Starr, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Needed this on my trip to niagra falls, needed to get some stills and did not want a 1000$ canon dslr to get water damaged. This thing did serve its pupose and my cam did not even get a splash on it. Pics came out great. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DoLittle

customer_reviews.title: Very large but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is quite a large camera rain cover I have a rebel T5 camera which is a larger camera and it seems slightly oversized but nothing that is too bad. It still works and protects my camera from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Fits camera good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten a chance to test it out in the weather. It fits my canon camera with the large zoom lens good and looks like it will work well. Trail without the rain and using the zoom it will do the job of keeping the camera and lens dry.
customer_reviews.author: TLT Action Photos

product_meta.title: Movo CRC23 Storm Raincover Protector for DSLR Cameras, Lenses, Photographic Equipment (Medium Size: 23 x 14.5)
feature_bullets: Water-resistant and lightweight rain cover made from nylon fabric
Emergency camera protection from inclement weather
Velcro fastener at bottom fits any tripod mount and allows for manual focusing inside rain cover
Front and rear cinching bands for quick and easy setup and camera access
1 Year Movo Warranty with Fast & Friendly Support
